text: All companies organized under this chapter, or which shall, under the provisions of this chapter, become entitled to transact the business of a trust company, shall report to the Superintendent of Banking and Financial Institutions pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 7 of this title.
historical:

1973 Ed., § 26-308.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-107, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 26-1352.

DC CODE § 26-1308

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Banks and Other Financial Institutions. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Trust, Loan, Mortgage, Safe Deposit and Title Corporations. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Reports to Superintendent of Banking and Financial Institutions.
